entry.title: MtGox blames bitcoin
entry.summary: Gavin, the project lead of Bitcoin, has quickly addressed the issue of MtGox trying to blame their problems on Bitcoin, which was harming the Bitcoin ecosystem. He wrote an official statement[1] setting the record straight and proving their incompetence. Although there are issues, MtGox should have worked around them rather than blaming Bitcoin. Additionally, Gregory wrote an article[2] about the matter as well. [1] https://bitcoinfoundation.org/blog/?p=418[2] http://www.cryptocoinsnews.com/2014/02/10/mt-gox-blames-bitcoin-core-developer-greg-maxwell-responds/
